body: Then `perm.size()` should be casted to `int64_t` as well. If I put it in the condition of the for loop, the cast will be done at each iterations as well? Or should I do the cast before the loop?
body_html: Then perm.size() should be casted to int64_t as well. If I put it in the condition of the for loop, the cast will be done at each iterations as well? Or should I do the cast before the loop?
body_text: Then perm.size() should be casted to int64_t as well. If I put it in the condition of the for loop, the cast will be done at each iterations as well? Or should I do the cast before the loop?
